Hi, I'm Aakanksha, a graduate student pursuing my Masters in Data Science at University of San Francisco.



I worked as a software developer at JP Morgan Chase for two years after graduating from National Institute of Technology, Calicut. I enjoy data science, competitive coding and web development. Check out my projects to know more about my work.
